normalised: Hey! Ayurveda treatments sound interesting. I've heard good things about Kerala Ayurvedic treatments. My neighbor, Priya, went to Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala and said it helped her a lot. Anyone tried panchakarma during Onam? I'm thinking of trying it. Also, after the treatment, biryani sounds so good! Share your experiences! Rupee five thousand for consultation seems reasonable.
